channel.title: Medical Imaging on Rachid. Zeghlache
channel.description: Recent content in Medical Imaging on Rachid. Zeghlache

item.title: Getting It Right: A Beginner's Guide to Medical Image Classification Do's and Don'ts
item.description: A hands-on tutorial designed specifically for beginners in medical image classification, covering essential do’s and don’ts for successful projects.

item.title: Deep Learning for Retinal Degeneration Assessment: The MARIO AMD Progression Challenge
item.description: A comprehensive analysis of the MARIO challenge held at MICCAI 2024, evaluating AI algorithms for detecting and monitoring age-related macular degeneration progression using OCT imaging.
